ygData.subject: Re: Castle Mistmoore
ygData.msgSnippet: I picked one of them glowing iron pikes up in a lambent trade.  Haven t been able to figure what to do with it sense.  Anyone know what they are worth value
ygData.messageBody:
I picked one of them glowing iron pikes up in a lambent trade. Haven't been
able to figure what to do with it sense. Anyone know what they are worth
value wise? No one seems interested in it for trades so far...

Taneran

----- Original Message -----
From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, January 31, 2000 10:37 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Castle Mistmoore


> From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
>
> I went to Mistmoore to browse around last night and help out some
> guildmembers. I wanted to pick up a few items, too.
>
> 50 paladin, 50 warrior, 50 bard, 39 druid, 39 wizard.
>
> The whole night yielded a few fangs, some wreaths, a few LotGP,
> a few Gypsy Lutes, and other crap I had no interest in.
>
> I knew enough about Mistmoore to get around, but last night I
> explored the whole damn place. Also did a sacrifice run too.
> But first the pulling and clearing.
>
> The group above I was in cleared; the Maid, Butler, kitchen,
> east conference room, piano room, and foyer with no problems.
> That's half the 1st floor of the entire castle. I'm thinking
> about taking in a high powered group to clean out the whole
> place tonight.
>
> So the sacrifice run. I get Garton Viswin on tracking and
> me and the paladin make a run for the tower. Finally get
> up there, and the joker has the damn pike. Well, I look
> around... 3 mobs, two of them have pets, and then Garton.
> 6 on 2 fight. Rather, 6 (4 with HT) on 2 fight hehe. Ah
> well, I've got L50 experience to burn. I know I'm gonna
> die, I told the paladin. Just make sure you kill Garton.
> I look around the rooom a bit more, trying to pick out the
> lucky mob I'm gonna charm. I always hated mistmoore naming
> on mobs. I found the one I thought to be the most powerful
> and ripped off a charm on it. The paladin then started to
> beat the crap out of Garton. My soul seductress or whatever
> is nuking the shit out of a deathly something while two pets
> and some vampire defiler are just clobbering me. A couple
> of recharms, and on LH on me, and one of the enemies drops.
> Then Garton dies, paladin is oom, and I have like 25 hp left.
> Whatever disease DoT I had on me killed me at that point since
> I was fearing away all the mobs, waiting for a heal.
>
> It was probably one of the best nights I've had in a while.
> Well, if the dhampyre would have dropped me a cloak, I would
> have been much much happier.
>
> Harmonic.
>
>
